about_the_game:
Silent Threat is a unique psychological exploration experience that envelops you in deep curiosity and tension. In a world filled with modern structures, dark corners, and mysterious tunnels, you will pursue the unknown. Every step you take will lead you to rooms filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered.

Each room in this world is rich with details that whisper their own stories. Though they might seem empty, the marks on the walls and the arrangement of the spaces combine with your imagination to convey a sense of a life once lived here. These rooms are silent witnesses, opening the doors to your own imaginative world. In these seemingly empty spaces, you are playing within your own mind, bringing the stories these rooms wish to tell to life.



Pay close attention to the sounds around you; the echo of your footsteps, distant creaks, and whispers of endless tension. These sounds are as unsettling as they are intriguing. They will help you find your way and navigate this mysterious world. Remember, there are no monsters, creatures, or ghosts in this game; the tension and mystery are entirely created through atmosphere and storytelling.



The visual and auditory atmosphere is designed to fully immerse you. Around every corner, at the end of every dark tunnel, a new mystery awaits. This journey will keep you on edge and continuously lead you to new discoveries. You will find yourself lost in this atmospheric world where tension and curiosity never cease. Gather your courage and uncover the secrets of the unknown in this unforgettable journey.
